name: Druid Runecarve 1
description:
Effects of Thick Hide, Astral Influence, Feline Swiftness, and Ysera's Gift increased by 75%.

When you shift into your Affinity's form, you gain Heart of the Wild for 10 sec, once every 1 min.

name: Druid Runecarve 3
description: Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time, and your healing over time effects in 15% less time.

name: Druid Runecarve 4
description: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are on a single target, their effects are increased 30%

name: Oneth's Clear Vision
description: Starsurge and Starfall each have a 15% chance to make the other free.

name: Primordial Arcanic Pulsar
description: Every 400 Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for 9 sec.

name: Druid Resto Runecarve 3
description: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

name: The Dark Titan's Lesson
description: You may Lifebloom two targets at once, and Lifebloom's final healing is increased by 100%.

name: Druid Resto Runecarve 4
description: Rejuvenation healing has a 2% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target.

name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 3
description: In Bear Form, Thrash has a 15% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 1
description: Thrash has 20% increased damage, 30% increased radius, and can stack 1 additional time.

name: Legacy of the Sleeper
description: Berserk in Bear Form grants 25% increased damage, 15% Leech, and immunity to effects that cause loss of control of your character.

name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 2
description: Barkskin reduces damage by an additional 15%. When it begins or ends in Bear Form, you gain Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration.

name: Memory of the Mother Tree
description: Wild Growth has a 25% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.

name: Apex Predator's Craving
description: Rip damage has a 4% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.

name: Druid Feral Runecarve 2
description: Tiger's Fury causes your next finishing move to restore 3 combo points.

name: Druid Feral Runecarve 1
description: Clearcast abilities generate 25% of their Energy cost, and your maximum energy is increased by 60.

name: Druid Balance Runecarve 3
description: Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 105%, decreasing by 15% every sec.

name: Timeworn Dreamcatcher
description: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Druid Feral Runecarve 4
description:
Combo point-generating abilities reduce the cooldown of 

<condition>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</condition>
<dynamic>Incarnation: King of the Jungle by 0.2</dynamic>

Berserk by 0.2 sec.

During 

<condition>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</condition>
<dynamic>Incarnation: King of the Jungle</dynamic>

Berserk, they cause the target to bleed for an additonal 50% of their damage over 8 sec.

name: Lycara's Fleeting Glimpse
description:
Every 45 sec while in combat, cast a spell based on your form:

No Form: <dynamic>Wild Growth</dynamic>
Cat Form: <dynamic>Primal Wrath</dynamic>
Bear Form: <dynamic>Barkskin</dynamic>
Moonkin Form: <dynamic>Starfall</dynamic>
Travel Form: <dynamic>Stampeding Roar</dynamic>
